original_text: God's Holy Spirit used his power to do many miracles. He caused many great and powerful things to happen. As a result, I have told the whole good news about Christ to many people. I have told it while I travelled all the way from Jerusalem to Illyricum. 15: Illyricum was a region near the Adriatic Sea, north and west from Greece. It was where the north part of Albania is now. korean_text: 표적과 기사의 능력으로 성령의 능력으로 이루어졌으며 그리하여 내가 예루살렘으로부터 두루 행하여 일루리곤까지 그리스도의 복음을 편만하게 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: God's Holy Spirit used his power
He caused many great and powerful things to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 위대하고 강력한 일들이 일어나게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: I have told the whole good news about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그리스도에 대한 모든 좋은 소식을 전했다

sentences.original_text: all the way from Jerusalem to Illyricum
It was where the north part of Albania is now
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 현재 알바니아의 북부가 있는 곳이었다
